other_title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT (Japanese)
plot: The adventures of the Neighbor's Club continue, with more understanding of their members, new friends, and of course, lots of laughs.
opening_theme: "Be My Friend" by Marina Inoue, Kanae Ito, Nozomi Yamamoto, Misato Fukuen, Kana Hanazawa and Yuka Iguchi
ending_theme: "Bokura no Tsubasa" (僕らの翼) by Marina Inoue, Kanae Ito, Nozomi Yamamoto, Misato Fukuen, Kana Hanazawa and Yuka Iguchi
